name: Ayni* central cut
description: Digital illustration i created for the virtual mural exhibition part of the Foro Internacional de Intervenciones Urbanas FIIU 5 (The fifth edition of the International Forum of Urban Intervention), that happened in Lima, Peru, in August 2020. Center crop of the digital illustration Ayni, with a street vendor resembling the Ekeko god of luck, stepping over his street cart and the city, to make an offering to the Andean sacred animal gods.
